message.body: If we can get a baby sitter do you guys want to do sushi on Saturday?
I don't know. Saturday might be booked. I'll asl Donna.
Ok. We tried for Friday but she couldn't watch Coop. If not sat then maybe next Friday
Saturday we have cooking class in KOP. Next Friday we're in DC for the night. Next Saturday night prolly works perfecto. 8ish?
I will check to see if that works.
